column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////good standby for fun atmosphere
column2: good for groups.  they take reservations unlike cafe iberico
column3: the other great tapas place in the city.  awesome sangria in fun flavors - mango
column5: etc.  (but i must admit i like red the best) and worth trying the mini-dessert menu (genius!).  bacon wrapped dates
column8: goat cheese on bruschetta a must.
